responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "0338E46649AD1AEAC9BA0FB56AFD835E", "Excellent! A keen mind and a steady hand are all one needs to start. We shall begin with a simple, practical garment: a shirt. It will teach you the basics of cutting, stitching, and finishing. Source some flax and weave a shirt from that thread. Show me the work when you\'re done.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Artisan_Dunir_RoricStonewool_5_Response
